attributes.action: make the BNP an illegal organisation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the Government to take legal moves to remove the British National Party's ability to operate/exist and stand for elections as it exists solely to promote the racist belief in white supremacy while causing tensions between our countries rich and diverse cultural make-up. The BNP runs in opposition to views and wishes of the vast majority of the British public.
